content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（※ウェンリーナーが居ない時に発生するクエストです","translatedEnglishLine":"(※ This quest occurs when Wenriner is not present"},{"lineNumber":257033,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　このクエスト中で　ウェンリーナー遭遇　が必ず発生します）","translatedEnglishLine":"　　　During this quest, an encounter with Wenriner will definitely occur)"},{"lineNumber":257034,"originalJapaneseLine":"夕方だし、そろそろ帰るかというシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"It's evening, and it's the scene where they think it's about time to go home."},{"lineNumber":257035,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウェンリーナーが、この直前で仲間になっているので","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Wenriner has just joined the party right before this,"},{"lineNumber":257036,"originalJapaneseLine":"会話に参加させてあげて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"please have her participate in the conversation."},{"lineNumber":257037,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてクリアとなります","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the quest is completed."},{"lineNumber":257038,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景：農地","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: Farmland"},{"lineNumber":257039,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は、聖女モンスターの情報を求めて","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others came seeking information about the Saint Monster."},{"lineNumber":257040,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここ、カコガワ農園に来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They had arrived here at the Kakogawa Farm."},{"lineNumber":257041,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地図ださなくていいです、どこの国とか説明なくて良し","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to show a map or explain which country it is."},{"lineNumber":257042,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人と戦う為には戦力が必要だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We need fighting strength to battle the Demon Lord."},{"lineNumber":257043,"originalJapaneseLine":"経験値稼ぎと食料採取をかねて行うぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll do this both to gain experience and gather food."},{"lineNumber":257044,"originalJapaneseLine":"聖女モンスター関係なのでは、ベゼルアイを出して下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"If it is related to the Saint Monster, please have Bezel Eye appear."},{"lineNumber":257045,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（※セラクロラスが居ない時に発生するクエストです","translatedEnglishLine":"(※ This quest occurs when Seracloras is not present"},{"lineNumber":257046,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　このクエスト中で　セラクロラス遭遇　が必ず発生します）","translatedEnglishLine":"　　　During this quest, an encounter with Seracloras will definitely occur)"},{"lineNumber":257047,"originalJapaneseLine":"夕方だし、そろそろ帰るかというシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"It's evening, the scene where they think it's about time to return."},{"lineNumber":257048,"originalJapaneseLine":"セラクロラスが、この直前で仲間になっているので","translatedEnglishLine":"Seracloras has just joined the party right before this,"},{"lineNumber":257049,"originalJapaneseLine":"会話に参加させてあげて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"please have them participate in the conversation."},{"lineNumber":257050,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてクリアとなります","translatedEnglishLine":"Then it will result in clearing the quest."},{"lineNumber":257051,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":257052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　条件：飛べランス城の後＝美樹を奪われた","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: After 'Fly Rance Castle' = Miki was taken"},{"lineNumber":257053,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれから一晩経ったが・・ランス城内の空気は暗い・・","translatedEnglishLine":"One night has passed since then... but the atmosphere inside Rance Castle is gloomy..."},{"lineNumber":257054,"originalJapaneseLine":"健太郎は朝飯にも現れずにぼーっとしている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kentaro hasn't appeared even at breakfast and is spacing out."},{"lineNumber":257055,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝の会議・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning meeting..."},{"lineNumber":257056,"originalJapaneseLine":"　状況を確認しよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's confirm the situation."},{"lineNumber":257057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍が侵入して美樹ちゃんを掠った","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army invaded and took Miki-chan."},{"lineNumber":257058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人ケイブリスを美樹を殺す事を目的にしていた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon lord Caibriss aimed to kill Miki."},{"lineNumber":257059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ魔王になりきっていない美樹を殺して自分が魔王になる","translatedEnglishLine":"He wants to kill Miki, who hasn't fully become the Demon King, and become the Demon King himself."},{"lineNumber":257060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐ殺す？　大丈夫・・魔王は頑丈なのでケイブリスが本気で","translatedEnglishLine":"Kill her immediately? It's okay... the Demon King is tough, so even if Caibriss hits seriously,"},{"lineNumber":257061,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殴ってもしばらくは持つはずですが・・永久ではないと","translatedEnglishLine":"she should hold on for a while... but not forever."},{"lineNumber":257062,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに救出に行きたいが","translatedEnglishLine":"We want to rescue her immediately,"},{"lineNumber":257063,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリスの居場所すら我々には分かっていない","translatedEnglishLine":"but we don't even know Caibriss's location."},{"lineNumber":257064,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物界の奥地であると思われるが、そこにいく事は不可能に近い","translatedEnglishLine":"It is believed to be deep in the monster world, but going there is nearly impossible."},{"lineNumber":257065,"originalJapaneseLine":"このまま世界が魔軍に滅ぼされるが早いか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Will the world be destroyed by the demon army first..."},{"lineNumber":257066,"originalJapaneseLine":"美樹が殺されて魔王ケイブリスが誕生するのが早いか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"or will Miki be killed and Demon King Caibriss born first..."},{"lineNumber":257067,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、俺様が美樹を救い出すそしてケイブリスを倒すのが先だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I will rescue Miki and defeat Caibriss first."},{"lineNumber":257068,"originalJapaneseLine":"引き続きケイブリスや美樹の情報を集めておいてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"Continue gathering information on Caibriss and Miki."},{"lineNumber":257069,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスさんは？","translatedEnglishLine":"What about Rance?"},{"lineNumber":257070,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は・・その時に備えて寝る。","translatedEnglishLine":"I... will sleep in preparation for that time."},{"lineNumber":257071,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　※特に必要なシーンではありませんが、マエリータ侵入の後、それに関係ない","translatedEnglishLine":"※ This is not a particularly necessary scene, but after Maelita's intrusion, and unrelated to it,"},{"lineNumber":257072,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　※準備フェイズのイベントばかりはなんなので、会話だけどもそれっぽくです","translatedEnglishLine":"※ Since it's all preparation phase events, it's just a conversation but made to feel appropriate."},{"lineNumber":257073,"originalJapaneseLine":"　条件：[英雄ブリティシュ]実行済み、アムが居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Condition: [Hero British] completed, Amu is present."},{"lineNumber":257074,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance Castle"},{"lineNumber":257075,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦いは前途多難、大変な状況が続いているという雰囲気","translatedEnglishLine":"The battle is fraught with difficulty, a feeling that tough times continue."},{"lineNumber":257076,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんなランス達を見て、縁側の爺婆ぽい会話をしているカオス、カフェ（なんなら日光も","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching Rance and the others, Chaos and Cafe are chatting like old folks on the porch (and if you like, Nikko too)."},{"lineNumber":257077,"originalJapaneseLine":"みんな大変ね、あの時の俺達にこれだけの仲間と力があったら何かを為し得ていたかなぁとか","translatedEnglishLine":"It's tough for everyone, I wonder if we had this many allies and strength back then, could we have achieved something?"},{"lineNumber":257078,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうすればいいか分からない事だらけ、もっと情報があればね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"There are so many things we don't know how to handle, if only we had more information..."},{"lineNumber":257079,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホラガの話になる、神に全ての知識を求めた。何かこの状況を打破出来る事を知っているかもしれない","translatedEnglishLine":"The conversation turns to Horaga, who sought all knowledge from the god. He might know something to break this situation."},{"lineNumber":257080,"originalJapaneseLine":"カフェは、うーん、やめた方が・・とか（彼女は一度会っている）","translatedEnglishLine":"Cafe says, hmm, better not... (she has met him once before)."},{"lineNumber":257081,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の誰かも来て、ランスも会話に入り、それならぜひ行くべきだという流れになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone else comes, Rance joins the conversation, and the flow leads to 'We definitely should go'."},{"lineNumber":257082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ケイブリスを倒す方法とか知っているかも","translatedEnglishLine":"　　He might know how to defeat Caibriss."},{"lineNumber":257083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　あてな、人間になる方法を知っているかも","translatedEnglishLine":"　　Maybe he knows how to become human."},{"lineNumber":257084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　美樹、健太郎、魔王を直す方法を知っているかも","translatedEnglishLine":"　　Might know how to fix Miki, Kentaro, and the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":257085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　パットン、この飛んでいるだけのランス城を動かす方法を知っているかも（　確認(\"ランス城は飛んでいる\")==1","translatedEnglishLine":"　　Patton might know how to move this flying Rance Castle (check \"Rance Castle is flying\"==1)."},{"lineNumber":257086,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":257087,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・","translatedEnglishLine":".."},{"lineNumber":257088,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてヘルマン北部、シベリア地方にランス達はやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Rance and the others arrived at the northern Helman, Siberian region."},{"lineNumber":257089,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図を確認する・・うわっ、こんな端なのかよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Check the map... wow, it's really such an edge of the world."},{"lineNumber":257090,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホ・ラガは、世捨て人になって世界の端にホ・ラガの塔を作って籠もっていると","translatedEnglishLine":"Horaga has become a hermit and built Horaga's Tower at the edge of the world and is secluded there."},{"lineNumber":257091,"originalJapaneseLine":"氷雪地帯、ホラガの塔を目指している途中、キャンプとか","translatedEnglishLine":"At the snowy icy region, on the way to Horaga's Tower, they camp and so forth."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※ウェンリーナーが居ない時に発生するクエストです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (※ This quest occurs when Wenriner is not present

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエスト中で　ウェンリーナー遭遇　が必ず発生します）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During this quest, an encounter with Wenriner will definitely occur)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕方だし、そろそろ帰るかというシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's evening, and it's the scene where they think it's about time to go home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウェンリーナーが、この直前で仲間になっているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Wenriner has just joined the party right before this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会話に参加させてあげて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please have her participate in the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてクリアとなります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the quest is completed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：農地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Farmland

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、聖女モンスターの情報を求めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others came seeking information about the Saint Monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、カコガワ農園に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had arrived here at the Kakogawa Farm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図ださなくていいです、どこの国とか説明なくて良し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to show a map or explain which country it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人と戦う為には戦力が必要だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need fighting strength to battle the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 経験値稼ぎと食料採取をかねて行うぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll do this both to gain experience and gather food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女モンスター関係なのでは、ベゼルアイを出して下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it is related to the Saint Monster, please have Bezel Eye appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※セラクロラスが居ない時に発生するクエストです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (※ This quest occurs when Seracloras is not present

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエスト中で　セラクロラス遭遇　が必ず発生します）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During this quest, an encounter with Seracloras will definitely occur)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕方だし、そろそろ帰るかというシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's evening, the scene where they think it's about time to return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスが、この直前で仲間になっているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras has just joined the party right before this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会話に参加させてあげて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please have them participate in the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてクリアとなります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then it will result in clearing the quest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：飛べランス城の後＝美樹を奪われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: After 'Fly Rance Castle' = Miki was taken

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから一晩経ったが・・ランス城内の空気は暗い・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One night has passed since then... but the atmosphere inside Rance Castle is gloomy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は朝飯にも現れずにぼーっとしている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro hasn't appeared even at breakfast and is spacing out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝の会議・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning meeting...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を確認しよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's confirm the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が侵入して美樹ちゃんを掠った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army invaded and took Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスを美樹を殺す事を目的にしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon lord Caibriss aimed to kill Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ魔王になりきっていない美樹を殺して自分が魔王になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants to kill Miki, who hasn't fully become the Demon King, and become the Demon King himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐ殺す？　大丈夫・・魔王は頑丈なのでケイブリスが本気で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill her immediately? It's okay... the Demon King is tough, so even if Caibriss hits seriously,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴ってもしばらくは持つはずですが・・永久ではないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she should hold on for a while... but not forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに救出に行きたいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to rescue her immediately,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの居場所すら我々には分かっていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but we don't even know Caibriss's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の奥地であると思われるが、そこにいく事は不可能に近い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is believed to be deep in the monster world, but going there is nearly impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま世界が魔軍に滅ぼされるが早いか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will the world be destroyed by the demon army first...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が殺されて魔王ケイブリスが誕生するのが早いか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or will Miki be killed and Demon King Caibriss born first...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、俺様が美樹を救い出すそしてケイブリスを倒すのが先だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I will rescue Miki and defeat Caibriss first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引き続きケイブリスや美樹の情報を集めておいてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continue gathering information on Caibriss and Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんは？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What about Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は・・その時に備えて寝る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... will sleep in preparation for that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※特に必要なシーンではありませんが、マエリータ侵入の後、それに関係ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※ This is not a particularly necessary scene, but after Maelita's intrusion, and unrelated to it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※準備フェイズのイベントばかりはなんなので、会話だけどもそれっぽくです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※ Since it's all preparation phase events, it's just a conversation but made to feel appropriate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：[英雄ブリティシュ]実行済み、アムが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: [Hero British] completed, Amu is present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは前途多難、大変な状況が続いているという雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle is fraught with difficulty, a feeling that tough times continue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなランス達を見て、縁側の爺婆ぽい会話をしているカオス、カフェ（なんなら日光も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching Rance and the others, Chaos and Cafe are chatting like old folks on the porch (and if you like, Nikko too).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな大変ね、あの時の俺達にこれだけの仲間と力があったら何かを為し得ていたかなぁとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's tough for everyone, I wonder if we had this many allies and strength back then, could we have achieved something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうすればいいか分からない事だらけ、もっと情報があればね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are so many things we don't know how to handle, if only we had more information...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの話になる、神に全ての知識を求めた。何かこの状況を打破出来る事を知っているかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The conversation turns to Horaga, who sought all knowledge from the god. He might know something to break this situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カフェは、うーん、やめた方が・・とか（彼女は一度会っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cafe says, hmm, better not... (she has met him once before).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の誰かも来て、ランスも会話に入り、それならぜひ行くべきだという流れになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone else comes, Rance joins the conversation, and the flow leads to 'We definitely should go'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒す方法とか知っているかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He might know how to defeat Caibriss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あてな、人間になる方法を知っているかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe he knows how to become human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹、健太郎、魔王を直す方法を知っているかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Might know how to fix Miki, Kentaro, and the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、この飛んでいるだけのランス城を動かす方法を知っているかも（　確認("ランス城は飛んでいる")==1
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton might know how to move this flying Rance Castle (check "Rance Castle is flying"==1).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてヘルマン北部、シベリア地方にランス達はやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance and the others arrived at the northern Helman, Siberian region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図を確認する・・うわっ、こんな端なのかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check the map... wow, it's really such an edge of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホ・ラガは、世捨て人になって世界の端にホ・ラガの塔を作って籠もっていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horaga has become a hermit and built Horaga's Tower at the edge of the world and is secluded there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯、ホラガの塔を目指している途中、キャンプとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the snowy icy region, on the way to Horaga's Tower, they camp and so forth.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

(she has met him once before)."},{"lineNumber":257081,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の誰かも来て、ランスも会話に入り、それならぜひ行くべきだという流れになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone else comes, Rance joins the conversation, and the flow leads to 'We definitely should go'."},{"lineNumber":257082,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　ケイブリスを倒す方法とか知っているかも","translatedEnglishLine":"　　He might know how to defeat Caibriss."},{"lineNumber":257083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　あてな、人間になる方法を知っているかも","translatedEnglishLine":"　　Maybe he knows how to become human."},{"lineNumber":257084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　美樹、健太郎、魔王を直す方法を知っているかも","translatedEnglishLine":"　　Might know how to fix Miki, Kentaro, and the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":257085,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　パットン、この飛んでいるだけのランス城を動かす方法を知っているかも（　確認(\"ランス城は飛んでいる\")==1","translatedEnglishLine":"　　Patton might know how to move this flying Rance Castle (check \"Rance Castle is flying\"==1)."},{"lineNumber":257086,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":257087,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・","translatedEnglishLine":".."},{"lineNumber":257088,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてヘルマン北部、シベリア地方にランス達はやってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Rance and the others arrived at the northern Helman, Siberian region."},{"lineNumber":257089,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図を確認する・・うわっ、こんな端なのかよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Check the map... wow, it's really such an edge of the world."},{"lineNumber":257090,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホ・ラガは、世捨て人になって世界の端にホ・ラガの塔を作って籠もっていると","translatedEnglishLine":"Horaga has become a hermit and built Horaga's Tower at the edge of the world and is secluded there."},{"lineNumber":257091,"originalJapaneseLine":"氷雪地帯、ホラガの塔を目指している途中、キャンプとか","translatedEnglishLine":"At the snowy icy region, on the way to Horaga's Tower, they camp and so forth."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※ウェンリーナーが居ない時に発生するクエストです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (※ This quest occurs when Wenriner is not present

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエスト中で　ウェンリーナー遭遇　が必ず発生します）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During this quest, an encounter with Wenriner will definitely occur)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕方だし、そろそろ帰るかというシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's evening, and it's the scene where they think it's about time to go home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウェンリーナーが、この直前で仲間になっているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since Wenriner has just joined the party right before this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会話に参加させてあげて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please have her participate in the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてクリアとなります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the quest is completed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景：農地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: Farmland

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は、聖女モンスターの情報を求めて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others came seeking information about the Saint Monster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、カコガワ農園に来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had arrived here at the Kakogawa Farm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図ださなくていいです、どこの国とか説明なくて良し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to show a map or explain which country it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人と戦う為には戦力が必要だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need fighting strength to battle the Demon Lord.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 経験値稼ぎと食料採取をかねて行うぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll do this both to gain experience and gather food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖女モンスター関係なのでは、ベゼルアイを出して下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it is related to the Saint Monster, please have Bezel Eye appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （※セラクロラスが居ない時に発生するクエストです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (※ This quest occurs when Seracloras is not present

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このクエスト中で　セラクロラス遭遇　が必ず発生します）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During this quest, an encounter with Seracloras will definitely occur)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夕方だし、そろそろ帰るかというシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's evening, the scene where they think it's about time to return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスが、この直前で仲間になっているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras has just joined the party right before this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会話に参加させてあげて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please have them participate in the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてクリアとなります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then it will result in clearing the quest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：飛べランス城の後＝美樹を奪われた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: After 'Fly Rance Castle' = Miki was taken

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから一晩経ったが・・ランス城内の空気は暗い・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One night has passed since then... but the atmosphere inside Rance Castle is gloomy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 健太郎は朝飯にも現れずにぼーっとしている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kentaro hasn't appeared even at breakfast and is spacing out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝の会議・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning meeting...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を確認しよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's confirm the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が侵入して美樹ちゃんを掠った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army invaded and took Miki-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスを美樹を殺す事を目的にしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon lord Caibriss aimed to kill Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ魔王になりきっていない美樹を殺して自分が魔王になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wants to kill Miki, who hasn't fully become the Demon King, and become the Demon King himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐ殺す？　大丈夫・・魔王は頑丈なのでケイブリスが本気で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kill her immediately? It's okay... the Demon King is tough, so even if Caibriss hits seriously,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殴ってもしばらくは持つはずですが・・永久ではないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she should hold on for a while... but not forever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに救出に行きたいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We want to rescue her immediately,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの居場所すら我々には分かっていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but we don't even know Caibriss's location.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界の奥地であると思われるが、そこにいく事は不可能に近い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is believed to be deep in the monster world, but going there is nearly impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このまま世界が魔軍に滅ぼされるが早いか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will the world be destroyed by the demon army first...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹が殺されて魔王ケイブリスが誕生するのが早いか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or will Miki be killed and Demon King Caibriss born first...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、俺様が美樹を救い出すそしてケイブリスを倒すのが先だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I will rescue Miki and defeat Caibriss first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引き続きケイブリスや美樹の情報を集めておいてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Continue gathering information on Caibriss and Miki.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさんは？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What about Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は・・その時に備えて寝る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... will sleep in preparation for that time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※特に必要なシーンではありませんが、マエリータ侵入の後、それに関係ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※ This is not a particularly necessary scene, but after Maelita's intrusion, and unrelated to it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※準備フェイズのイベントばかりはなんなので、会話だけどもそれっぽくです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ※ Since it's all preparation phase events, it's just a conversation but made to feel appropriate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 条件：[英雄ブリティシュ]実行済み、アムが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Condition: [Hero British] completed, Amu is present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いは前途多難、大変な状況が続いているという雰囲気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle is fraught with difficulty, a feeling that tough times continue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなランス達を見て、縁側の爺婆ぽい会話をしているカオス、カフェ（なんなら日光も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching Rance and the others, Chaos and Cafe are chatting like old folks on the porch (and if you like, Nikko too).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな大変ね、あの時の俺達にこれだけの仲間と力があったら何かを為し得ていたかなぁとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's tough for everyone, I wonder if we had this many allies and strength back then, could we have achieved something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうすればいいか分からない事だらけ、もっと情報があればね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are so many things we don't know how to handle, if only we had more information...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホラガの話になる、神に全ての知識を求めた。何かこの状況を打破出来る事を知っているかもしれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The conversation turns to Horaga, who sought all knowledge from the god. He might know something to break this situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カフェは、うーん、やめた方が・・とか（彼女は一度会っている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cafe says, hmm, better not... (she has met him once before).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の誰かも来て、ランスも会話に入り、それならぜひ行くべきだという流れになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone else comes, Rance joins the conversation, and the flow leads to 'We definitely should go'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスを倒す方法とか知っているかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He might know how to defeat Caibriss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あてな、人間になる方法を知っているかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe he knows how to become human.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 美樹、健太郎、魔王を直す方法を知っているかも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Might know how to fix Miki, Kentaro, and the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パットン、この飛んでいるだけのランス城を動かす方法を知っているかも（　確認("ランス城は飛んでいる")==1
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton might know how to move this flying Rance Castle (check "Rance Castle is flying"==1).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてヘルマン北部、シベリア地方にランス達はやってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Rance and the others arrived at the northern Helman, Siberian region.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図を確認する・・うわっ、こんな端なのかよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check the map... wow, it's really such an edge of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホ・ラガは、世捨て人になって世界の端にホ・ラガの塔を作って籠もっていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horaga has become a hermit and built Horaga's Tower at the edge of the world and is secluded there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯、ホラガの塔を目指している途中、キャンプとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the snowy icy region, on the way to Horaga's Tower, they camp and so forth.
